name: Michael Jordan
bio: Michael Jordan is widely considered the greatest basketball player of all time. He led the Chicago Bulls to 6 NBA championships and won 5 MVP awards. Jordan was known for his incredible skills, competitive spirit, and clutch performances. He transformed basketball and became a global icon.

name: Kobe Bryant
bio: Kobe Bryant was one of the greatest players in NBA history. He spent his entire career with the Los Angeles Lakers and won 5 championships. Kobe was known for his work ethic, skill, and 'Mamba Mentality'. He passed away in a helicopter crash in 2020, leaving behind an unforgettable legacy.
achievements: 81 points in a single game (2nd highest in NBA history)

name: LeBron James
bio: LeBron James is one of the greatest players of all time and the current all-time leading scorer in NBA history. He has won 4 championships with three different teams. LeBron is known for his versatility, leadership, and longevity at the highest level.

name: Shaquille O'Neal
teams: Phoenix Suns, Cleveland Cavaliers, Boston Celtics
bio: Shaquille O'Neal was one of the most dominant centers in NBA history. Standing 7'1" and weighing over 300 pounds, he was nearly impossible to stop. Shaq won 4 championships and was known for his powerful playing style and entertaining personality.
